commit message: Update Ukrainian translation.
Update Russian translation.
Simplified fab behavior
More generic view type for image buttons.
Don't auto rewind when we pause on interruption
Add a preview
Change the github url to the root of the project
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/gladk/MaterialAudiobookPlayer into develop
Updated translations
Collapse fab immediately only when we return from activity result. Minor performance tweaks.
Simplified book equals and hashcode methods
Fixed book updating and simplified the sorting in the sortedList
Simplified listener handling
Simplified code
Added a no-window theme to prevent overdraw

Revert 'Added a no-window theme to prevent overdraw'

This reverts commit e89a32ae6ead584dc7cc8b108b9caac37197f598.
Minor refactor
Do the actual database updating by an executor and use the list for the internal representation at runtime.
Minor structural updates & updated gradle
Don't pass the book in the callback as its not needed.
Set the cover in an onPreDrawListener and convert it to a bitmap so the transition for the custom drawable won't fail
Include the cover imageview and set a transitionname for an upcoming shared element transition.
Make the scene transition for the cover
Enable transitions for the themes
Sets transition names correctly.
Only flush the codec if inputBufIndex is above 0
Enabled leak canary for debug mode.
Updated dependency
Use an initial capacity for performance improvements. (in collections)
Removes executor stuff for less complications
Separated edit name and edit cover
Set initial capacity
Use isEmpty for the rect validation check
Use the full bookName and let the coverReplacement decide on the length
Fixed the test accordingly to the new activity name
Simplified book cover editing. Don't use an array of bitmaps any more as that was a bad practice and caused OOMs.
Made some methods static
Minor performance improvements
Make more use of singleton list
Removed travis build file
Start the activity with clear top / new task flags because our context is outside of an activity
Track dialogfragments and activity by leakcanary
Updated german translation
Make use of Collections.emptyList()
Correctly update new books in the book shelf and prevent the refreshing of the library twice.
Sleep timer count down: improve visual clue when enabled #199
Sleep timer count down onStart fix
Odd attr in layout

Merge pull request #278 from skynetua/199_sleep_timer_countdown

Sleep timer count down: improve visual clue when enabled #199
Added missing brackets, removed unnecessary import and added missing override
Removed redundant call. Fixes memory leak
Simplified countdown timer initialization and removed code duplciates
Name static final capitalized
Cancel the timer after the callback has been removed to prevent racing condition issues
Improved code clarity
Removed 1000 ms offset that caused wrong time to show up
Use a single style for both sleep texts
Removed unnecessary check because we read from a set.
Added storage that wasn't auto-detected. Fixes #277

Update CHANGELOG.md

Solves #270
Update changelog for 2.3.3. Fixes #271
Changelog for 2.3.3.1 Fixes #272
Merge branch 'master' into develop
Simplified getResourceId
Add ripples on non selected spinner item. #268
Use a ripple on >= lollipop for the selected spinner item. Closes #268

Wrap the spinner content inside a linear layout. That way our size will be set correctly. Set a max line of 3 and min height to the dropdownListPreferredItemHeight. This way very long names wont be cut of. Fixes #269
Remove last transition view field
Use the book name as the name for the cover transition. That way the return transition finally works!
Finally fixed cover transition by giving each view a fixed transition name based on its id.
Add ripples to the cover. Closes #279
Remove coordinatorlayout and snackbar as we have a timer showing the progress of the sleep timer now.
Enabled scene transition for fab
Removed unused resources and simplified some code
Don't null the return transition
Removed unnecessary postponing of the transition.
Removed ripples on folder overview icon. Fixes #280
Removed copy constructor from chapter as it is (except of the id) immutable. Massively reduces object creation.
Blacklist lgE455 for custom mediaplayer
Wrote tests for the playback components
Decreased logging
Shortened timeout for the player executor and increased verbosity
Postpone the transitions till the elements are ready.
Sets the result to ok so the activity that started the transition will receive its onActivityReenter
Simplified postponing and use correct transition name
Updated dependencies to api 23
Use the new notification compat in combination with media style, so we can use that on api below lollipop. Also we have a close button in the notification, so we dont neet a manual one.
Use the fragments as base class for leak watching
Correctly remove the onPreDrawListener after onPreDraw was called once.
Update README.md
Fix typo. Closes #267
Merge branch 'master' into develop
Suppress some deprecation warnings
Allow a full backup
Ignore overdraw warning
Removed unused resources
Suppress private resource lint warning
Updated russian and korean translation
Downgraded build tools due to https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=183309
Made mediaPlayerController a singleton.
Get the time directly from the scheduled future.
Added changelog for 2.3.0. Closes #273
Disabled minify as there are some problems for now
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/Ph1b/MaterialAudiobookPlayer
